version_description:
- Added timer for fuel replenishing
- Challenge bug fixes
- Cornering gameplay adjustments
- Visual upgrades and performance enhancements
- Other minor improvements

Thanks for riding with us! See you at the tracks!

- Fixed login issue affecting some players

Thanks for riding with us! See you at the tracks!
Global release of Dirt Bike Unchained! Have fun and see you at the tracks!
Global release of Dirt Bike Unchained! Have fun and see you at the tracks!

- Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Thanks for riding with us!
New Challenges! Race in new challenges delivered to you daily for great rewards.
New Challenges! Race in new challenges delivered to you daily for great rewards.
New Challenges! Race in new challenges delivered to you daily for great rewards.

Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Thanks for riding with us!

- Daily free gifts - just a small "thank you" for joining the ride
- Daily offers, so you could get the best value items at the reduced price
Thanks for riding with us!

Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Thanks for riding with us!

Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Thanks for riding with us!

We've been watching your reviews closely and are happy to bring more content and features to the game with this update:
- Team challenge leaderboard, so you know who is putting those hours on the bike and deserve to be on the team
- "Raw Race" Global Challenge. Pull the throttle and join other madheads in global competition for outstanding in-game rewards.

We've been watching your reviews closely and are happy to bring more content and features to the game with this update:
- Team challenge leaderboard, so you know who is putting those hours on the bike and deserve to be on the team
- "Raw Race" Global Challenge. Pull the throttle and join other madheads in global competition for outstanding in-game rewards.

We've been watching your reviews closely and are happy to bring more content and features to the game with this update:
- Team challenge leaderboard, so you know who is putting those hours on the bike and deserve to be on the team
- "Raw Race" Global Challenge. Pull the throttle and join other madheads in global competition for outstanding in-game rewards.

- Team challenge leaderboard, so you know who is putting those hours on the bike and deserve to be on the team
- "Raw Race" Global Challenge. Pull the throttle and join other madheads in global competition for outstanding in-game rewards.
We've been watching your reviews closely and are happy to bring more content and features to the game with this update.

- Team challenge leader board, so you know who is putting those hours on the bike and deserve to be on the team
- "Raw Race" Global Challenge. Pull the throttle and join other mad heads in global competition for outstanding in-game rewards.
- Team chat. Finally, you can introduce yourself to the team and motivate each other in the game.

- XMAS Race competition with lots of in-game rewards and real-world prizes starts soon. More details will be available in the game on December 23rd. Get ready for the action!
- Ride it your way! Bike skins and looks now available in the game.
- Data privacy improvements to comply with Apple's Policy

- Those cool bike skins now help you progress faster. Win more while looking good!
- New daily reward track to appreciate your dedication.
- New onboarding system for the new Dirt Bikers.

- Those cool bike skins now help you progress faster. Win more while looking good!
- New daily reward track to appreciate your dedication.
- New onboarding system for the new Dirt Bikers.

- Bike upgrade values have been streamlined.
- Mentor levels now go up to 12.

- Personal Seasons! Complete daily missions to earn points and get cool rewards. Seasons refresh every two weeks.
- Get the most out of the Personal Seasons with Weekly and Monthly Pro Pass subscriptions.
- Teams and players who achieve high ranks in the Team Leaderboard will now receive additional rewards and commemorative badges to show off their achievements.
- Minor improvements and bug fixes.
- Minor improvements and bug fixes.
- Minor improvements and bug fixes.
